response.overview: Inside a burnt-out church, rain spatters on the balcony, burnt-out rafters arch above, and the floor sags below. The stain-glass window to the side is an advertisement for travel on a salvation spaceship to the planet Artin Seven...  Timing the Difference Between Good and Bad: The clown conducts a chemistry experiment on a balloon dog...  Operating on a hotdog: the Surgeon's Assistant is also the Master of Ceremonies...  The dreamer awakes and finds a parking meter in his bedroom.
response.title: REM
